title: Samsung note 4

comment: It is still autostarting, when connecting to bluetooth, please try it out before uploading to public, as i said, it is still autostarting!

Please let me know if this has improved your experience 

thanks,
Peter

title: Does not work on Gear S

comment: Note 4 Gear S does not work refund or fix
title: Does not work Gear S

comment: Really like the app but the constant notifications asking me to open it are driving me batty.

reply.author: Spritefish
reply.content: Fixed this issue in latest version

title: Good app

author: Mark Pickett
comment: Does NOT work on my Gear 2

reply.author: Spritefish
reply.content:
Mark, 

the version in Google Play works with Android Wear devices. To use Snapzy with a Galaxy Gear, you must download it from the Gear App store by Samsung.
Please contact me for a refund - and if possible, please remove this 1-star rating 

thanks,
Peter

title: Does Not work

author: Yoni Gross
comment: I love the shake to take a picture functionality. It's a brilliant solution to the problem of taking a picture one-handed when you have a phone in the other hand. Unfortunately, the app randomly launches itself on my Moto 360, draining battery, getting in the way, and filling up my phone with random pictures.
title: Mixed results

author: Darren walker
comment: As much as I love this idea,  I can't seem to get it to work on my neo! May I have a refund please?

reply.author: Spritefish
reply.content:
This version of the app only works on Android Wear devices. To use it on a Galaxy Gear, please purchase the app in the Samsung app store.

Please contact support@spritefish.com for a refund.

title: Won't transfer to my watch!
